sentences.sContent: Last year Collins wrote a moving ballad which highlighted the plight of the homeless.
sentences.sCn: 去年柯林斯写了一首感人的叙事诗，突出描写了无家可归者的苦境。

synos.tran: 最精彩的部分；最重要的事情；[电子]加亮区

words.tran: 增强亮度；突出性，醒目性
使…显著；以强光照射（highlight的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: If someone or something highlights a point or problem, they emphasize it or make you think about it
